changeSet.author: akurganov
changeSet.sql: update documents set doc_type='REAL-ESTATE' where doc_type='REAL_ESTATE';
update documents_log set doc_type='REAL-ESTATE' where doc_type='REAL_ESTATE';
update documents set doc_type='SOON-RESETTLEMENT-REQUEST' where doc_type='SOON_RESETTLEMENT_REQUEST';
update documents_log set doc_type='SOON-RESETTLEMENT-REQUEST' where doc_type='SOON_RESETTLEMENT_REQUEST';
update documents set doc_type='RESETTLEMENT-REQUEST' where doc_type='RESETTLEMENT_REQUEST';
update documents_log set doc_type='RESETTLEMENT-REQUEST' where doc_type='RESETTLEMENT_REQUEST';
update documents set doc_type='DASHBOARD-REQUEST' where doc_type='DASHBOARD_REQUEST';
update documents_log set doc_type='DASHBOARD-REQUEST' where doc_type='DASHBOARD_REQUEST';
update documents set doc_type='ARM-SHOW-APART-REQUEST' where doc_type='ARM_SHOW_APART_REQUEST';
update documents_log set doc_type='ARM-SHOW-APART-REQUEST' where doc_type='ARM_SHOW_APART_REQUEST';
update documents set doc_type='ARM-APPLY-REQUEST' where doc_type='ARM_APPLY_REQUEST';
update documents_log set doc_type='ARM-APPLY-REQUEST' where doc_type='ARM_APPLY_REQUEST';
